Ok guys this shit is working 100%. I had problem installing it as well. 
If it does not work try this. 
1) Install NOD 32 (any will do, even from other download)
2) Restart to Safe Mode (press F8 after reboot)
3) (In safe mode) Right click on ESET PureFix "run as administrator" and click "Enable"
4) Restart again.

If you did everything right you should have no expire date in NOD 32.

2) Restart to Safe Mode (press F8 after reboot)

A quick tip to you all. After you're done using the "PureFix" patch in safe mode, add it to an archive before restarting. The antivirus detects it as a threat and it automatically quarantines it. By adding it to an archive you keep it from doing that, and you can use the patch again some other time if needed.
